text: Henry Lea Hillman (December 25, 1918 â€“ April 14, 2017) was an American billionaire businessman, investor, civic leader, and philanthropist. He was chairman of The Hillman Company, a family office and investment company headquartered in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, and owned by the Hillman family. He chaired the board of trustees of Hillman Family Foundations. which manages 18 named foundations. Hillman died on April 14, 2017 in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, aged 98. ==References== ==Other websites== * Henry L.
